content: of a nuclear war. ## secret experiments however, most vaults were secretly designed to conduct social experiments on the dwellers. each [VAULT-TEC:vault] was built with a different social experiment. for example: - [VAULT-TEC:vault] 11: residents had to sacrifice one person each year - [VAULT-TEC:vault] 22: experimented with genetically modified plants - [VAULT-TEC:vault] 76: a control [VAULT-TEC:vault] with no experiment, designed to recolonize the surface ## [[VAULT-TEC:vault]-TEC:[VAULT-TEC:vault]-tec] technology [[VAULT-TEC:vault]-TEC:[VAULT-TEC:vault]-tec] developed advanced technology for their vaults, including: 1. water purification systems 2. food production facilities 3. air filtration systems 4. advanced security systems this document is prepared for rag system testing.
